title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Brown the beef with garlic and onions. Add tomato sauce. Simmer for 20 minutes. Serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill chicken. Cook tomato sauce with cream and butter. Add chicken. Serve with rice.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich tomato sauce and ground beef.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Brown the beef with garlic and onions. Add tomato sauce. Simmer for 20 minutes. Serve hot.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A flavorful dish with tender chicken pieces in a creamy curry sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill chicken. Cook tomato sauce with cream and butter. Add chicken. Serve with rice.

title: Chicken Alfredo
summary: A creamy pasta dish with chicken, butter, and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Cook fettuccine. Brown the chicken with garlic. Add butter, cream, and cheese. Simmer for 10 minutes. Serve hot.

title: Chicken Parmesan
summary: Breaded chicken topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese.
instructions: Bread chicken with flour, eggs, and bread crumbs. Fry chicken. Top with tomato sauce and cheese. Bake for 20 minutes.
